registration.views module¶

registration.views.handleLogin(request)[source]¶

This method will access those who signed up before .we have to provide username and password for login. The site can not be entered if the username or password is incorrect.

Parameters

  • name – request - used to generate responses(Http) depending on the request that it receives

  • type – HttpResponse

Returns

returns home page

Returns

returns httpResponse

registration.views.handleLogout(request)[source]¶

This function is for user logout.

Parameters

  • name – request - used to generate responses(Http) depending on the request that it receives

  • type – HttpResponse

Returns

returns login page

registration.views.handleSignup(request)[source]¶

This function is for user signup.This method will register new customers. User will get values from form and it will check if username or email is already registerted or not. Then it will create a user object and save it.

Parameters

  • name – request - used to generate responses(Http) depending on the request that it receives

  • type – HttpResponse

Returns

returns home page
